QuestData.Title: Arkhaan's Pain
QuestData.Description: Darkness envelops us... the Light has gone from this place...$b$b<Arkhaan mumbles to himself before noticing you are still talking to him.>$b$bArkhaan could not save them. Brothers. Sisters. Whispers twisted them. The Light cannot see them. It turns away from us.$b$bArkhaan failed.$b$b<Arkhaan stares off into space.>
QuestData.RewardText: <The broken peers suspiciously at his surroundings, avoiding eye contact with you.>
